name: Pixel Jump (WhyNotBeFriendss)
description:
Pixel Jump (now as an Chrome Extension!)

Platform jumper that is both relaxing and challenging. Get started on your quest, collect coins, and beat your previous high score. Purchase items in the store, as well as background themes, characters, and passive/active items, with your coins. After you've completed your quest, you'll can claim your reward. Customize your settings to your preferred level of difficulty.

Will be working on fixing bugs,  further implementing more dynamic quests(if I can be creative), more great lofi music and option to select track, more store items 

Credits and thanks to 

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/

https://elthen.itch.io/

https://bensmir.itch.io/

Enjoy
